property.description: Specifies the directories where the NodeManager stores its localized files. All of the files required for running a particular YARN application will be put here for the duration of the application run. Cloudera recommends that this property specify a directory on each of the JBOD mount points; for example, /data/1/yarn/local through /data/N/yarn/local.
property.name: yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs

property.description: Specifies the directories where the NodeManager stores container log files. Cloudera recommends that this property specify a directory on each of the JBOD mount points; for example, /data/1/yarn/logs through /data/N/yarn/logs.
property.name: yarn.nodemanager.log-dirs
